markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dangle](/Feats.aspx?ID=2410) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Flexible Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=2405)

</column>

---

You can hang by your tail from any suitable anchor point, such as a tree branch, balcony, or rocky outcropping (subject to the GM's discretion), typically while climbing. While hanging, you have free use of all your other limbs, so you can perform tasks that require both hands, such as firing a bow or swinging a greatsword.
name: Dangle

While hanging, you have free use of all your other limbs, so you can perform tasks that require both hands, such as firing a bow or swinging a greatsword.
